System Information

Service Level Objective (SLO)

We maintain a 99.9% uptime target, which translates to approximately 44 minutes of maximum expected downtime per month.

Infrastructure

Services are distributed across two primary locations:

  • London: Primary production environment
  • Copenhagen: Testing and backup environment

Each location has redundant servers for high availability.
